SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (
SELECT unq, category, ctgtype, ctggender, price, csize, color, thumbnail, hits, substr(name,0,20) name FROM goodsinfo ORDER BY hits DESC
) a ) b
WHERE rn >= 1 AND rn <= 6

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT rownum rn, a.* FROM (
SELECT unq, category, ctgtype, ctggender, price, csize, color, thumbnail, substr(name,0,20) name FROM goodsinfo
WHERE ( 1=1 ) $sql$
ORDER BY unq DESC
) a ) b
WHERE rn >= #s_no# AND rn <= #e_no#
SELECT unq, category, ctgtype, ctggender, price, csize, color, thumbnail, goodsimg, hits, name FROM goodsinfo WHERE unq=#unq#
SELECT unq, goodsimg FROM goodsinfo WHERE unq=#unq#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userinfo WHERE userid=#userid#
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM userinfo WHERE userid=#userid# AND pass=#pass#
SELECT userid, pass, name, birth, phone, email, zipcode, address1, address2, rdate, udate FROM userinfo WHERE userid=#userid#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO userinfo( userid, pass, name, birth, phone, email, zipcode, address1, address2, rdate, udate ) VALUES ( #userid#, #pass#, #name#, #birth#, #phone#, #email#, #zipcode#, #address1#, #address2#, sysdate, sysdate )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE userinfo set name=#name#, birth=#birth#, phone=#phone#, email=#email#, zipcode=#zipcode#, address1=#address1#, address2=#address2#, udate=sysdate WHERE userid=#userid#
UPDATE goodsinfo SET hits=hits+1 WHERE unq=#unq#
